title: H38 files?
body:
Hello Folks,

Do you have background and reference files built for Hg38?  Any docker image for this tool? The install is failing.  I'd like to give this a try with our ctDNA datasets.

Thanks, David

title: Size of virtual families with alt allele
body:
Hello,

I'm looking to gather information about the families that contain the alternate allele. It looks like this idea was started on line 63 of virtual_family.py but I don't think this is returned by that function. Is there a simple way to extract this data? Mean size of families that have the alternate allele would be very helpful. 

Cheers,

Brian
